meanings.definition: To make more acute or intense
meanings.sent1: The loud noise sharpens his focus on the task at hand.
meanings.sent2: The bitter cold sharpens the feeling of loneliness.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected twist sharpens the suspense in the story.
meanings.sent4: The bright spotlight sharpens the attention on the performer.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors sharpens the beauty of the painting.
